text: O.K., Roddy, whatever you say. Hugh drained his glass and ordered two more beers.'I'm really beginning to feel it's all a bit of a waste of time, anyway. I've been collecting scraps of evidence and piecing them together for four months now, and the whole lot still doesn't amount to anything one could call concrete.
